author: kpedro88
body:
@davidlange6 @hengne requested followup to #16535. I went through and found all the Pythia6 configs in `Configuration/Generator` that had obvious Pythia8 counterparts (identical filenames except with either "TuneCUETP8M1" or "pythia8" in the newer version). I also checked that none of the removed files are used anywhere in `Configuration/PyReleaseValidation`.

There are still a number of configs that don't have any Pythia8 counterpart. If PDMV wants to move all of those to Pythia8 as well, probably better to appoint someone to do it...
title: remove a bunch of unneeded Pythia6 configs
